reviewText: I like old B movies and this is about what I expected.

I am very disappointed with this 3 disc set.  Out of the nine movies, only 2 were worth watching, Night Of The Living Dead & The Last Man On Earth starring the late great Vincent Price.  I rate the other movies DDD. I haven't viewed the Making Of The Night Of The Living Dead yet.  It was all I could do to get through the others.
As a horror buff you have to appreciate the old stuff and I love this collection!  I haven't seen some of these since I was a kid so it's a treat to have 'em all on a couple of DVDs.

THE NIGHT EVELYN CAME OUT OF THE GRAVE
THE HOUSE BY THE CEMETARY
FANGS OF THE LIVING DEAD
I EAT YOUR SKIN
THE LAST MAN ON EARTH
KING OF THE ZOMBIES
NIGHT OF THE LIVING DEAD
THE THIRSTY DEAD
MESSIAH OF EVIL
